data.eml:eml: Three new species of the genus Hylaeus (Hymenoptera: Colletidae) from South Korea

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chen, Huan, Xu, Huanli (2012): Three new species of the genus Hylaeus (Hymenoptera: Colletidae) from South Korea. Zootaxa 3419: 62-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.210564
